rules_text:
When Rookie Spellthief enters, it experiments. [i](Exile the top card of your library. You may put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. If you don't, you may play the exiled card this turn.)[/i]
{U}, Sacrifice Rookie Spellthief: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is Rookie Spellthief's power.
